attributes.action: Make Councils to replace the single use bins and replace them for multi use bins
attributes.additional_details: The reason I want the government to make our councils replace these single use bins for the multi use bins is because I believe we could all do more to make a positive impact on the planet by recycling and by putting multi use bins in and replacing the single use bins would help and make it easier for everyone to recycle even when they are out and about. Ive worked on the bins before and these single use bins don't get sorted they just go to landfill, Its our time to change it and make a change!
attributes.background: I want the government to make our councils replace the single use bins you see in most places to the multi use bins which has recycling and general waste.

rejection.details: Decisions around bins are operational matters for councils to decide, rather than for the Government to set out. You could write to your local council requesting that it changes the kinds of bins it provides to households: https://www.gov.uk/find-local-council
